eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:left-derivative1}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial V^A_\mu}} U_\mu
& = & 
\displaystyle{\frac{1}{{\rm k}}}{\rm Tr}\Big( 
( \displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial V^A_\mu}} U_\mu ) U_\mu^\dagger t^B 
\Big) t_B U_\mu        
 = 
\displaystyle{\frac{i}{{\rm k}}}\int^1_0 ds {\rm Tr}\Big( 
{\rm e}^{isV_\mu}t_A {\rm e}^{-isV_\mu} t^B 
\Big) t_B U_\mu                           \nonumber \\  
& \equiv &
i K_A^{\ B} (x, \mu) t_B U_\mu             \ , \nonumber \\  
{\hat E}_A  (x, \mu)                    
& \equiv & 
-i L_A^{\ B} (x, \mu) \displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial V^B_\mu}}      \ , \quad
K_A^{\ C} L_C^{\ B} 
 =  
L_A^{\ C} K_C^{\ B} = \delta_A^{\ B}      \ . 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:left-derivative2}
{\hat E}_A ( x, \mu ) U_\mu (x) 
& = &   
t_A U_\mu (x)     \ ,      \nonumber \\  
{\hat E}_A ( x, \mu ) U_\mu^\dagger (x) 
& = &   
 - U_\mu^\dagger (x) t_A     \ ,      \nonumber \\  
 \Big[ {\hat E}_A ( x, \mu ), {\hat E}_B ( y, \nu ) \Big] 
& = & 
-i f_{AB}^{\ \ \ C} {\hat E}_C (x, \mu) \delta_{x,y}\delta_{\mu\nu}   \ . 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
\label{eq:U(N)Langevin-eq1}
& {} & U_\mu (\tau + \Delta \tau ,\ x)   \nonumber \\
& {} & \qquad \qquad 
= 
 {\rm exp}\Big( 
 \Delta \tau ( {\hat E}(\tau, x, \mu )S[U( \tau )] )  
 + i \Delta W_\mu (\tau, x)  \Big) U_\mu (\tau, x)
\ ,   \nonumber \\ 
& {} & < ( \Delta W_\mu )_{ij} (\tau, x ) ( \Delta W_\nu )_{kl} (\tau, y )>_{\Delta W}      \nonumber \\
& {} & \qquad \qquad 
= 
2{\rm k} \Delta \tau \delta_{\mu\nu} 
\delta_{il}\delta_{kj}  \delta_{xy}     \ , 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:U(N)Langevin-eq2}
\Big( \Delta  U_\mu (\tau, x) \Big) U_\mu (\tau, x)^\dagger 
 =  
 \Delta \tau ( {\hat E}( \tau, x, \mu )S[U( \tau )] ) + i \Delta W_\mu (\tau, x) 
 - \Delta\tau {\rm k}N {\bf 1}  \ . 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:Ito-constraint1}
\Delta U_\mu U_\mu^\dagger + U_\mu \Delta U_\mu^\dagger 
& = & 
- \Delta U_\mu \Delta U_\mu^\dagger + O ( \Delta\tau^{3/2})  \nonumber \\
& = & 
- 2\Delta\tau {\rm k}N {\bf 1} + O ( \Delta\tau^{3/2})    \ ,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:time-development-observable} 
\Delta F [U]   
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%& = & 
%\sum_{x, \mu}( \Delta U_\mu (x))_{ij} 
%\displaystyle{\frac{\delta\ }{\delta (U_\mu (x))_{ij}}}F[U] 
%+ \displaystyle{\frac{1}{2}}\sum_{x,\mu}\sum_{y,\nu}
%( \Delta U_\mu (x) )_{ij}( \Delta U_\nu (y) )_{kl}
%\displaystyle{\frac{\delta^2\ }{\delta (U_\mu (x))_{ij} 
%\delta (U_\nu (y))_{kl}}}F[U]   \ , \nn 
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
& = & 
\sum_{x,\ \mu} \Big(  
 \Delta \tau ( {\hat E}(x, \mu )S[U] ) 
+ i \Delta W_\mu (x, \mu) 
 \Big)^A {\hat E}_A F [U]    \nonumber \\ 
& {} & 
\quad - \sum_{x,\ \mu} \Delta \tau {\hat E}^A {\hat E}_A  F [U]
 - \sum_{x, \mu}\Delta\tau {\rm k}N (U_\mu (x))_{ij} \displaystyle{\frac{\delta F[U] }{\delta (U_\mu (x))_{ij}}}         \ , 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:measure-eq1}
- \Delta\tau {\rm k}N \sum_{x, \nu} ( U_\mu (x))_{ij} \displaystyle{\frac{\delta\ }{\delta (U_\mu (x))_{ij}}}F[U] 
= 
 \Big( F[ {\rm e}^{-{\rm k}N \Delta\tau} U ] - F[U]  
\Big) \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:U(N)Langevin-eq3} 
& {} & \Delta V^A_\mu ( \tau, x )   \nonumber \\
& =  & 
- i ( ( \Delta U_\mu ) U_\mu^\dagger )^B L_B^{\ A}
+  {i\over 2}\Delta V^B_\mu \Delta V^C_\mu (( \partial_B \partial_C U_\mu ) U_\mu^\dagger )^{A'}  L_{A'}^{\ A} + O(\Delta\tau^{3/2})        \nonumber \\
& = &
 \Big( - i \Delta \tau {\hat E}( \tau, x, \mu )S[U] +  \Delta W_\mu ( \tau, x )   
 + i  \Delta\tau {\rm k}N {\bf 1} 
 \Big) ^B L_B^{\ A}         \nonumber \\
& {} & \qquad + 
i \Delta \tau L_{B'}^{\ B} L_{B'}^{\ C} \Big( ( \partial_B \partial_C U_\mu ) U_\mu^\dagger \Big) ^{C'} L_{C'}^{\ A}   + O(\Delta\tau^{3/2})       \ ,  \nonumber \\ 
& =  & 
 \Big(  - i \Delta \tau {\hat E}( \tau, x, \mu )S[U] +  \Delta W_\mu ( \tau, x )   \Big) ^B L_B^{\ A} ( \tau, x, \mu )         \nonumber \\
& {} & \qquad +  \Delta \tau ( \partial_B L_C^{\ A} ) L_C^{\ B} ( \tau, x, \mu ) 
  + O(\Delta\tau^{3/2})     \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:U(N)Langevin-eq4}
\Delta V^A_\mu ( \tau, x )
& = & 
-\Delta \tau G^{AB} ( \tau, x, \mu )\displaystyle{\frac{\partial S}{\partial V^B_\mu (x)}} ( \tau )    \nonumber \\
& {} & \quad - 
\Delta \tau \Gamma^A_{\ \ BC}G^{BC} ( \tau, x, \mu )
+ \Delta_W V^A_\mu ( \tau, x )    \ , \nonumber \\
< \Delta_W V^A_\mu ( \tau, x )\Delta_W V^B_\nu ( \tau, \nu )>_{\Delta W} 
& = & 
2 \Delta \tau G^{AB}( \tau, x, \mu ) \delta_{\mu\nu}  \delta_{xy}  , 
\
